nodes.name: return fmt('Zoom Background: @%s, (%s%%, %s%%), [%s, %s], @%sf%s', fmtNumVar(p.layer), fmtNumVar(p.zooming.x), fmtNumVar(p.zooming.y), GS.CONST.EASING_TYPES[p.easing.type], GS.CONST.EASING_IN_OUT[p.easing.inOut], fmtNumVar(p.duration), p.waitForCompletion ? ', Wait' : '')
